details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.4.5 Fonts - 8.4.5.8 Unicode character maps - Unicode mapping
details.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 14289-2, 8.4.5.8
